snippet.title: Super Mario Starshine Demo Trailer (F3 2022 Version)
snippet.description:
F3 2022 PRESENTATION: https://youtu.be/LAkwRaXHpeo
Also yeah, before you make your "sneaky comment" telling me that this is a reposted video, yeah I'm well aware of it. Although I figured I'd upload this trailer since it's a slightly shorter version of the original trailer I made for the Super Mario Starshine Demo Release. If you haven't seen this trailer before then I hope you enjoy it!

Super Mario Starshine Discord Server:
https://discord.gg/2Qzqn3WGfY

GAMEBANANA PAGE: https://gamebanana.com/mods/388863

DEMO DOWNLOAD:
https://www.mediafire.com/file/8ynmhr6v5y0owzb/Super_Mario_Starshine_Demo_v1.4.rar/file

PATCHER VERSION: https://github.com/Lord-Giganticus/Starshine-Patcher/releases/tag/v2.0

Super Mario Starshine is a modification of Super Mario Galaxy 2 that aims to mostly recreate Super Mario Sunshine in the Galaxy 2 engine. A Demo for this project is currently released which contains a total of 20 Shine Sprites to collect!

Yoshi Star Galaxy Remix (Trailer Theme): https://youtu.be/tWI_ezPZtmM

Super Mario Galaxy 2 Project Template by Aurum:
https://www.youtube.com/c/DerAurumBurger
Galaxy Level Engine by Super Hackio:
https://www.youtube.com/c/SuperHackio
Shine Mod by Froggo:
https://youtube.com/channel/UCiyIBAMGwkgvlc2uIIIikTg

Social Links and Stuff:
My Discord - https://discord.gg/3xvcveZ
My Twitter - https://twitter.com/SPG642
My Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/spg64

#SuperMarioGalaxy #SuperMarioGalaxy2 #SuperMarioSunshine

Thanks for watching my stuff! :D
